title: BootStrap it up!
content: Have you ever used bootstrap for your styling and structure of your website? NO?! well boy are you missing out on some nice and easy styling, it wont kill you to try it.

title: gitHub Copilot
content: Can anyone please tell me what the heck is Github copilot and why is it so secretive? Will I still have a job when it is released?

title: handlebars
content: Is it just me, or does the handlebars logo pretty cool? Anyways, I am brand new to handlebars and so far I am really enjoying the simplicity of it! 10/10 would recommend.
